title: ‘Atlanta’ Season 4, Episode 6 Recap
description:
Charles and Van dive into the ‘Crank Dat’ era of hip-hop, the choke hold that sneakers have on society, and much more as they break down the sixth episode of the final season of ‘Atlanta.’Hosts: Charles Holmes and Van Lathan
Associate Producer: Jonathan Kermah
